title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 116.1 - General information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 116.1 - General information

State Regulations
A bank or trust company that seeks the superintendent's
consent to leave one or more vacancies on its board of directors unfilled
pursuant to Banking Law ยง 7005(1)(b) should submit a letter application at the
address set forth in section
1.1
of Supervisory Policy G 1 of
this Title (Attention: Applications Unit). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
116.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
